tasks.title: Google AI Pro OAuth Backend Integration
tasks.description: Implement OAuth authentication flow for Google AI Pro users in `cratos-llm` and expose via API.

tasks.title: Fix Critical UI Bugs (Persona, History, Docs)
tasks.description: Resolve Persona Details/Skills missing (Issue #2), History View 404 (Issue #3), and Docs 404 (Issue #5).

tasks.title: Settings API & Memory Ontology Backend
tasks.description: Fix Settings API sync issues (Issue #4, #6). Implement Ontology-based data structure for Memory RAG (Issue #7).

tasks.title: Settings UI & Google AI OAuth UI
tasks.description: Fix Settings UI sync state (Issue #4, #6). Add Google AI Pro OAuth selection UI (Issue #1).

tasks.title: Memory Graph Visualization Improvement
tasks.description: Enhance /memory graph visualization to reflect Ontology structure (Issue #7).

tasks.title: TUI Overhaul
tasks.description: Completely improve or replace the existing TUI in `src/cli` (Issue #8).

tasks.title: Mobile (iOS, Android) Native App Scaffolding
tasks.description: Implement initial project structures for Android (Gradle) and iOS (Sources) including WebSocket and A2UI WebView bridge.

tasks.title: Android: Connect Hilt & WebSocket Bridge
tasks.description: Set up Hilt DI, implement WebSocket connection logic, and bridge WebView events to ViewModel.

tasks.title: iOS: Project Setup & WebView Coordinator
tasks.description: Configure Xcode project, import sources, and implement WKScriptMessageHandler for A2UI interaction.

tasks.title: Server: A2UI Bundle Distribution API
tasks.description: Expose endpoint to serve compiled A2UI assets for mobile clients.

tasks.title: Android: Remote Bundle Streaming & Caching
tasks.description: Download, unzip and cache A2UI bundle from server to internal storage.

tasks.title: Android: TTS Audio Streaming (ElevenLabs)
tasks.description: Implement audio playback service for TTS messages received via WebSocket.

tasks.title: iOS: Remote Bundle Manager & Caching
tasks.description: Implement bundle download and storage logic for iOS client.

tasks.title: iOS: TTS Audio Player Integration
tasks.description: Implement AVFoundation audio playback for server-side TTS signals.
